Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: cory

} // ]]> var cv_mo3H3B5RY6224FBRollOverImg = new Image(); cv_mo3H3B5RY6224FBRollOverImg.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/918-MWxTtKS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play-active,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo3H3B5RY6224FBcurrentClick) { return cv_mo3H3B5RY6224FBcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 1:10 MinsI got this for a Foscam F18910W. The package came really fast. I chose to hang it on the corner of my house I built a corner bracket to mount it. Looking at the construction I saw what other reviewers were talking about so I didn't take any chances even though it is under an eave. I put a little silicon around the top seam and drilled a weep hole in the globe to let out any water that may get in side. As far as mounting the camera inside there was no mounting hardware that came with the housing just a metal plate that mounts in the housing. if the camera is mounted flat on the plate you will not see much. the way I fixed that was to use a 1/4-20 x 4 toggle bolt with a nut on the other side to put the camera as close to the globe as possible, this worked out quite well. now as far as the infrared illumination the camera has with the globe on is useless. but that is not the fault of the housing maker. All I can do is turn off the infrared unfortunately that makes the foscam cameras useless at night.

Reviews.Title: Great Dome Enclosure
Reviews.Author: Richard Boyd
Reviews.Content: I've had this unit up on my garage for about a year now, with a Foscam pan-&-tilt camera inside it. The camera has been safe and secure inside, and sees the surveillance area with perfect clarity. The enclosure has protected the camera from high winds, rain and hail, snow, and extreme subzero and 100+ degree temperatures. It stays clean and dry inside the dome. It is made of plastic, but the base plate and the mounting plate inside are sturdy steel. It was easy to assemble and mount on the garage wall, as well mount the camera inside.Tip: You might want to get a couple IR illumination flood lights for using this enclosure with a Foscam camera or one of the many knock-offs of Foscam. I had to put up a couple IR illumination flood lights to illuminate the area at night, because the IR lights on the camera reflect off the inside of the dome and must be turned off. However, that is normal for that type of camera.

Reviews.Title: not to bad =)
Reviews.Author: Chris Swiontek
Reviews.Content: first off, i must say that the shipping is really quick,and that this dome is built well for what it is.with that being said, there are a few things that i didnt like {not really bad, but unexpected}  CONS-the bracket arm that actually suports the dome is made of PLASTIC {not metal}, tho it has small metal suport plates on the end that attaches to the wall ,for structural support.-the mount plate only has 2 screw holes in it to suport it {add the weight of the dome plus the weight of the camera you choose to put inside,and it just doesnt feel very solid} YOU'LL want to drill more holes n the wall plate to hold this enclosure securely.-NO GASKET BETWEEN THE CLEAR COVER AND THE DOME! so i added a small beed of silicon around the edge where it goes together to keep it from filling up with water in the rain. {first time i mounted this ,it rained,and the clear dome wis 1" full of rainwater. the foscam i put inside it was ok tho. ever since i added the the silicon beed around it,its been fine ever since and water-free =)its a cheep dome that can be shipped very quickly. i will probably order again when i need a dome realy quick for a job site,but if time allows,id use something else.but hey, its a $70 dome. what do ya expect=)

Reviews.Title: Waterproof and intimidating.
Reviews.Author: sshjaguar
Reviews.Content: This case works great for my pan/tilt Zmodo camera(s), it's proven fully rainproof so far and it has a certain intimidation factor from it's shear size... this thing is rather big (about the size of a basketball), but it makes it that much more authoritative looking to any suspect characters that wander onto your property.

Reviews.Title: Well made but maybe a little over priced.
Reviews.Author: Steven L. Fletcher "slfletcher"
Reviews.Content: Well made but maybe a little over priced since it's all plastic. I used the enclosure to mount a Foscam indoor camera for outside security.You will need the VideoSecu 1/4" x 20 Threads Swivel Security Camera Mount or make you own mount. The camera mounts upside-down but that is not a problem as the software can be set to flip and mirror the image.  You cannot use the Foscam's built-in infrared as it reflects on the inside of the dome and blinds the camera.  I used three CMVision IR30 WideAngle IR Illuminators mounted above the enclosure to provide infrared light. The system has been through a few rain and wind storms and seems to be fine. It's still working.If you don't already have a camera you may want to consider buying a Foscam FI8919W Outdoor Pan and Tilt Wireless IP Camera since it would be ready to install.

Reviews.Title: Works Well with the Foscam FI8918W
Reviews.Author: Walter Stones
Reviews.Content: I used this enclosure on my back porch with the indoor Foscam FI8918W. I mounted the enclosure under my upper deck on the 2x8 header board and ran the power cord through the wall to my kitchen circuit. I use the WiFi, which work just great. The Foscam FI8918W does fit well in the enclosure, with a little imagination. You have to use the camera's mount and then make it work with the enclosure mount. But in the end it just works perfectly. I also RTV'ed it in all the critical places and even built a Rain Hat for it under the deck out of Metal Flashing. Looks good.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Dome - Simply Perfect
Reviews.Author: Brad Hayes
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I was looking for. The camera works great. I have had no issues with water. As mentioned in another review, the IR functionality does not work with the dome because of the reflection but I didn't need it anyway.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Michael Mcconville
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of the guys and they work great.  Did not have any trouble with filling with water like other users, they even went through a few tropical storms.  I live in So Florida so they are out in the hot sun all day with Foscams in them.  I never had any problems of the cameras shutting down because of heat, even in July and August.I believe the water issue is due to the arm that holds the dome to the structure.  I would say if it is not level water would follow down the arm into the dome.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Joseph S. Unjakoti
Reviews.Content: It's a good outdoor camera enclosure dome. The only complaint I have is that the screw holes on the wall mounting arm are weak and came cracked on both the enclosure domes I bought. I had to use some PVC glue to beef it up. After all the whole camera and the big dome is hanging off from this arm outdoors with wind blowing over the dome. That could put a lot of pressure on the screws holding the arm to the wall.

Reviews.Title: Very strong, good quality
Reviews.Author: gadgetjunki "gadgetjunki"
Reviews.Content: thick plastic, strong and very big.  It has a slight tint on the dome.  I was pleased at the quality.  Not five stars since it isn't perfect, size, price,no way to use the LED's without reflection and no gasket (though this may not be a problem)  The plastic arm was a concern for some reviewers but it seems strong enough to me.  I would have thought there is a better option (fit wise) for Foscam but apparently not for this price range.  It is still a really a good buy in my opinion.Please click "yes" if this was a helpful reviewThanks

Reviews.Title: Perfect for outside
Reviews.Author: Larry Roberts
Reviews.Content: We just placed wireless Foscams all over our house including outside and they fit perfectly in these domes. High quality material and well constructed. The only negative is the fact that if you use IR lights, they will reflect back making them not usable but you will get that issue with most domes.

Reviews.Title: Tough to install.
Reviews.Author: Random
Reviews.Content: Very hard to wire it to outside. I thought it came with pre-wiring so that all I have to do is plug in the foscam.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I have ordered different IP Out Door Cameras from different places.  Most of them I returned because of one reason or the other, but when I ordered this item and put one of my cameras inside (FI8910W) and installed it high on a pole, I was well pleased that it works great and is weather proof.  I recommend this type housing for your outside cameras.

Reviews.Title: Professional Looking Enclosure
Reviews.Author: daveg
Reviews.Content: This is a very professional looking enclosure. I bought it to mount my indoor Foscam IP camera in, outside on my back porch. Bewarned, that you will not be able to use your infrared on your Foscam when mounted inside this enclosure. It creates quite a glare as does most cameras when placed in front of a window or inside any similar type of enclosure.If you truly want a weather proof infrared camera, buy one.

Reviews.Title: Dome...
Reviews.Author: igozingo
Reviews.Content: Well what can I say. Its a dome. Water tight, nice, does what it should, protects! Its nice, well made......etc. Buy it.

Reviews.Title: MUCH LARGER THAN IT SEEMS.
Reviews.Author: J. Mayer "Swelljill"
Reviews.Content: I was surprised. This thing is HUGE. Also make certain your camera has a mode to turn off the IR lights or all you'll see is the inside of the enclosure. I should have guessed it would not be as advertised since they spelled ENCLOSURE  E-N-C-L-O-S-E-R It has "U" in the word you know. So I guess as an "encloser" it's perfect!!! Cant' even write that since my spell checker has a fit.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: dky
Reviews.Content: It fits my Foscam PT camera nicely.  Sturdy construction.  My only reasons for not giving 5 stars are; 1) pricey for what it is, and 2) it has no weather seal.  As others have complained, water will get in.  It has a channel inside that would hold a rubber ring to seal it but such a seal is not provided.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work at night
Reviews.Author: Larry W. Smith
Reviews.Content: This is a good product if you have some light. If IR is on the reflection of the LEDs is so strong you can't see anything. Foscam Cameras have a great night vision feature which is rendered useless while in the dome. Good buy if you only want the in the day or have good lighting at night.

Reviews.Title: Great dome ever after my DIY!
Reviews.Author: Wency Roll
Reviews.Content: About 2 months ago, I bought a LOFTEK CXS2200 to monitor my outer corridor. And to my surprise, it works so well so far. But question is that it is an indoor camera that is not weatherproof, so I have to buy a cover to protect it as I place it outside. So I purchased this dome encloser. The decision I made is definitely a good one, for there are so many winter storms later. The CXS2200 fits it so well and this encloser does a great job. It works so good in the day-time, allow the camera to record the crystal- clear picture. But it will reflect the IR from the camera and that really affect the definition of the record picture. Though it has stated in its description on the Amazon and some guys have written a review about that, I didn’t expect that it would turn out like this. When it gets dark I am seeing glare spots which make the camera image worthless and the reflections are coming from inside the dome. And no matter how I adjust the position the reflections remained stable relative to the camera view. I tried many combinations of mode and brightness all without success. After several trying, I contact their customer service and received an answer that it’s the normal phenomenon. So, it’s a great dome cover if it can solve this problem.Update:I found a fantastic way to resolve it. That’s use tennis ball to cover on the CXS2200 and reduce the IR reflection at night. And I have to say that it works great!Here’s the DIY process: 1. Take a tennis ball and cut off its both sides 2. Use the knife to cut off a circle for the lens (a little circle which can see a little bit IR) 3. Cover it on the CXS2200.After doing this, it would not arise any glare spots in the night vision and everything works so great!! I recommend to everyone!!

Reviews.Title: good quilty
Reviews.Author: LeRoy Harvey
Reviews.Content: what i was trying to put on this enclosure was a foscam ,and i'm finding it a little difficult . mount a hair different and can't fully assemble before installing . would like a short cad 5 wire that was maleon one end and female on other. mabe there not available . plus a short 12 v. power line mayb16" ?? as a option .

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: remon
Reviews.Content: you can use infrared because the dome glas is reflecting the light of the foscam cameraso for the night it is use less

Reviews.Title: Huge !
Reviews.Author: RyanP
Reviews.Content: This thing is very large.  It feels cheaply made.  I have my doubts as to it's "weather proof" claims.  If the the enclosure cost 19 dollars, I'd feel less ripped off.

Reviews.Title: Massive but adaptable
Reviews.Author: Kevin L. Gibson
Reviews.Content: The unit is HUGE for home use. It's great that screws can be taken out to adapt for home use.Just took the top off, used a toggle bolt and attached it straight to the underside of the house.

Reviews.Title: Much bigger than I expected
Reviews.Author: Andy S
Reviews.Content: I had visions of this being a lot smaller but it was fairly large. I decided to return this as it was way too large or the side of the house.

Reviews.Title: Works well!
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: I have been using this for a while now (about nine months) and works great with my Foscam FI8910W Pan & Tilt IP/Network Camera. I have mounted outside on my garage to see my driveway and the side of my home. One problem is that because the camera is equipped with infrared night vision a glare is produced within the plastic dome at night and does not allow you to see anything. So I removed the plastic dome and use it without. Its done great in rain or fog during the night. I am happy. I should have done more research on the IR reflection not the company's fault. I do see now where is reads..."the dome case will reflect the IR light back to camera at night". But again I am still happy and I know that I can use an outside IR to illuminate my driveway during the night.

Reviews.Title: 7" Outdoor Dome Encloser
Reviews.Author: David l bush
Reviews.Content: LIKE all things you must be able to adapt cam to encloser which means that this is a enclosure and not a kit you may have to make a bracket for the cam and don't forget about the power over ethernet some cams are 5 volts with diferent power plugs on them and then there 12 volt units. all in all seems to be well made now to mount it to a pole hum.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected!
Reviews.Author: The German
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these domes for my foscams which I mounted outdoors for surveillance of my house. When I mounted them, I took a little silicone to seal the glass and they are really water tight and my cameras are still working for about a year now! The only drawback: The glass reflects the IR LEDs, so at night I have to have them switched off. Other than that, a great product which held up to 100mph winds till now!

Reviews.Title: Good dome for camera
Reviews.Author: bensol
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my camera which is outside my home. I have had no problem thus far and keeps the camera dry under all the weather conditions...  Good purchased

Reviews.Title: Missing Parts
Reviews.Author: KennyM
Reviews.Content: Ordered 2 of these, one with all the parts, the other missing one part (the bottom dome lens).  I returned the one with a missing part and a refund is pending.  The one with all the parts went together well with the camera fitting well inside.

Reviews.Title: It'a a great product for the price!
Reviews.Author: Buddy J. Currens
Reviews.Content: I have two of these units and they are well crafted and look very well installed.  The only problem, as pointed out by other reviewers, is the reflection of the infrared LED's interfering with the picture at night.  If you turn off the IR it works fine as long as you have adequate lighting.

Reviews.Title: DOES NOT WORK WITH  FOSCAM WITHOUT ADDITIONAL PARTS AND MODIFICATION
Reviews.Author: Baloo
Reviews.Content: I have a high dust environment that I want to use this in. First, there are no instructions whatsoever included, however at first glance, there appears to be none needed.The mounting plate that comes with it, leaves no mounting accommodation for the FOSCAM FI8910W I was using it with. Luckily, I had also purchased the Videosecu 1/4" x 20 Threads Swivel Video Camera Mount 2-6 Inch Adjustable Universal Pan Tilt CCTV Camera Mounting Bracket with Ceiling Clip 1BO. Modifying this allows you to mount the camera, however the dome has to be totally disassembled, and even then it is a challenge to get the camera level once it is in there.Aside from a philips screwdriver, you will need a drill to make holes for the mount and very tiny hands to adjust the mount once it is in there.Sure wish we could find an alternative.

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: D Clark
Reviews.Content: Had it just over a year and haven't had any problems with water or even condensation; it is installed under my eaves though.  The product description does state waterproof so I can understand why some of the low reviews if that did turn out to be the case.  I did have a minor problem with the dome screws galling up when disassembling for the first time prior to installation, but I replaced the bad screws and re-tapped all of the holes, haven't had any problems after that.Also, the dome works with Agasio A512-POE camera, which failed after just over a year, so I replaced it with a Foscam FI8921W, which also fits well.

Reviews.Title: Works well.
Reviews.Author: Ken S. Sato
Reviews.Content: I sealed the gap with silicone calk and it has gone through several rain storms with no leakage.  Could be sturdier but for the price this is a good option if you have a camera that fits.

Reviews.Title: Not perfect
Reviews.Author: clong
Reviews.Content: I brought this out dome enclosure to mount an outdoor surveillance camera. It is very hard to install a camera it does not allow you enough access to install the camera and hook up the wires. There is no seal around the bottom ring to keep dampness out I used sealant to shield the ring. It lets the camera view very good during the day but at night time when you turn on your IR lights they reflect back into the camera. They reflect into the camera from the dome so badly that you cannot see no image so I wind up turning them off to see an image. If you buy this product be prepared to take a lot of time to install it. Yours truly not perfect

Reviews.Title: 7" outdoor Dome Encloser
Reviews.Author: C. Hooper
Reviews.Content: The company got the 7" outdoor Dome Encloser to me on time and does cover the wireless surveillance camera, allowing the camera to move up,down, left and right just fine. Also works great in daylight.

Reviews.Title: monster
Reviews.Author: Tim Griffin
Reviews.Content: Bought it to cover up a outdoor camera, but it would not fit, and the thing is much larger than it looks wider than my 12" eve

Reviews.Title: Not tinted - Not compatible with CXS 2200
Reviews.Author: Peter Wood
Reviews.Content: - The dome looks tinted, but is actually clear- Didn't work out of the box with CXS 2200 LOFTEK Newest CXS 2200 Wireless/Wired Pan:270°&Tilt;:120° Dual Audio Alarm Ip camera,15 Meter Night vision,3.6mm Lens ,67° Viewing Angle,easy installation.White (I had to build a custom bracket)- There were no installation instructions included

Reviews.Title: It/s not good for a night vision camera
Reviews.Author: Faustino Juarez
Reviews.Content: the foscam camera fits perfectly insideBUT . . . for a night vision camera, it is NOT GOOD .. because the infrared on the cameracreates glare and obstructs the view.Is there a Solution? any body . . . . let me know.

Reviews.Title: Nice, but useless at night.
Reviews.Author: thanhxuan nguyen
Reviews.Content: Massive, nice and stable.  Easy to install except it is useless when it is dark outside.  Need to leave outdoor light on all night so the IP camera could project a clear view of the area.  It would have been perfect if the dome were not tinted.

Reviews.Title: Total piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Michael H Lazarski
Reviews.Content: If you are trying to protect an in-door camera and install it outside with this ... totally WORTHLESS. Save your money, The dome lens wipes out your camera "seeing" anything.

Reviews.Title: I do not understand this business
Reviews.Author: Yesdesser2
Reviews.Content: I bought this and try to put a real indoor security camera there but it does not fit.If you can make fake camera, why can't you make real camera enclosure?

ProductInfo.Features:
WaterProof Outdoor 7" Dome Case for Wireless Pan and Tilt IP Camera
the dome case will reflect the IR light back to camera at night
ProductInfo.Name: 7" Outdoor Dome Encloser for Loftek Foscam Wansview Apexis Cctv Surveillance Security Wireless Ip Camera
